latex:
The sequence $(z_n)$ of complex numbers satisfies the following properties:
\begin{itemize}
\item $z_1$ and $z_2$ are not real.
\item $z_{n+2}=z_{n+1}^2z_n$ for all integers $n\geq 1$.
\item $\dfrac{z_{n+3}}{z_n^2}$ is real for all integers $n\geq 1$.
\item $\left|\dfrac{z_3}{z_4}\right|=\left|\dfrac{z_4}{z_5}\right|=2$.
\end{itemize}
Find the product of all possible values of $z_1$.
